amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on actions of the President to address violations of religious freedom in Saudi Arabia.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3697 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3697 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9589-9590) To express the sense of the Senate on actions of the President to address violations of religious freedom in Saudi Arabia.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3697 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Schumer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3697 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
